title: Detox Support
author: Janelle N
cleaned_text: extremely concentrated blend of super greens, herbs, mushrooms, antioxidants, enzymes and much more. It is an excellent way to safely detox and support your organ systems throughout a detox regimen. It is also an excellent way to get your serving of 'greens' in each day. Start with 2 capsules with a meal. Can work dosing up to 3 capsules daily (with meals). Supplement Facts Manufactured in a US FDA inspected facility. GMP Compliant. These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. 1 Review - My First Cleanse I wanted to use this along with my first ever detox cleanse.
